main event: A witness observed a bright star-like object in the sky over Roanoke Rapids, North Carolina on November 8, 1966.
interesting points: The object appeared rounded in shape, similar to a bright star or satellite.
The object was observed for approximately 25 minutes and disappeared and reappeared during the sighting.
The witness stated the description of the object is consistent with that of a satellite observation.
The witness had previously seen two similar objects hovering around their home in the same area on October 8, 1966.
The sighting was reported to the local police department.
